enb_long_title: Tenth Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI)
section_title: Institutional linkage of the FCCC Secretariat to the United Nations
sentences: Based on informal consultations, the Secretariat produced a draft decision (FCCC/SBI/CRP.2), which was referred to COP-5 for adoption.

The draft decision: recalls Decision 14/CP.1, which sets 31 December 1999 as the final date to review the institutional linkage of the FCCC Secretariat to the United Nations; notes that the institutional linkage is working satisfactorily; invites the UN General Assembly to decide at its 54th session whether to meet the Convention`s conference servicing expenses from its regular budget; and decides that the institutional linkage of the Convention to the UN shall continue, subject to review no later than 31 December 2001.
